mapper.insert: insert into customer (cust_id, cust_name, email, phone, birth, credit_point, cust_code) values (#{custId}, #{custName}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{birth}, #{creditPoint}, #{custCode})
insert into business_corporation (cust_id, business_number, company_name, fax, corporation_number) values (#{custId}, #{businessNumber}, #{companyName}, #{fax}, #{corporationNumber})
insert into online_bank (cust_id, id, pw, document) values (#{custId}, #{id}, #{pw}, #{document})
